name: UniScaleNR Strong
author: kim2091
description:
Category: Universal Models
Purpose: Universal Upscaler
Pretrained: 4xESRGAN

Version of UniScale trained with camera noise injection (NR = Noise Removal). This model removes noise from images while upscaling.
dataset: Custom Dataset consisting of lossless 4k frames from Metal Arms: Glitch in the System, Just Cause 3, Dirt 3, Forza Horizon 3, Sleeping Dogs, and self-edited photos from SignatureEdits
